N₂Γ₂_to_karoubi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
theorem N₂Γ₂_to_karoubi : «expr ⋙ » (toKaroubi (ChainComplex C ℕ)) («expr ⋙ » Γ₂ N₂) = «expr ⋙ » Γ₀ N₁ :=
  by
  have h :=
    functor.congr_obj (functor_extension₂_comp_whiskering_left_to_karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ) (simplicial_object C)) Γ₀
  have h' :=
    functor.congr_obj (functor_extension₁_comp_whiskering_left_to_karoubi (simplicial_object C) (ChainComplex C ℕ)) N₁
  dsimp [N₂, Γ₂, functor_extension₁] at h h'⊢
  rw [← functor.assoc, h, functor.assoc, h']
#align N₂Γ₂_to_karoubi N₂Γ₂_to_karoubi
N₂Γ₂_inv_app_f_f:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `simplex_category.mk -/
@[simp]
theorem N₂Γ₂_inv_app_f_f (X : Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ)) (n : ℕ) :
    (N₂Γ₂.inv.app X).f.f n =
      «expr ≫ » (X.p.f n) ((Γ₀.splitting X.X).ι_summand (Splitting.IndexSet.id (op (simplex_category.mk n)))) :=
  by
  dsimp only [N₂Γ₂, functor.preimage_iso, iso.trans]
  simp only [whiskering_left_obj_preimage_app, N₂Γ₂_to_karoubi_iso_inv, functor.id_map, nat_trans.comp_app,
    eq_to_hom_app, functor.comp_map, assoc, karoubi.comp_f, karoubi.eq_to_hom_f, eq_to_hom_refl, comp_id,
    karoubi.comp_p_assoc, N₂_map_f_f, HomologicalComplex.comp_f, N₁Γ₀_inv_app_f_f,
    P_infty_on_Γ₀_splitting_summand_eq_self_assoc, splitting.to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁_hom_f_f, Γ₂_map_f_app,
    karoubi.decomp_id_p_f]
  dsimp [to_karoubi]
  rw [splitting.ι_desc]
  dsimp [splitting.index_set.id]
  rw [karoubi.homological_complex.p_idem_assoc]
#align N₂Γ₂_inv_app_f_f N₂Γ₂_inv_app_f_f
N₂Γ₂_compatible_with_N₁Γ₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟭» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem N₂Γ₂_compatible_with_N₁Γ₀ (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) :
    N₂Γ₂.hom.app ((toKaroubi _).obj K) = «expr ≫ » (N₂Γ₂ToKaroubiIso.hom.app K) (N₁Γ₀.hom.app K) :=
  congr_app
    (((whiskeringLeft _ _ (Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ))).obj (toKaroubi (ChainComplex C ℕ))).image_preimage
      («expr ≫ » N₂Γ₂ToKaroubiIso.hom N₁Γ₀.hom : «expr ⟶ » _ («expr ⋙ » (toKaroubi _) ((«expr𝟭») _))))
    K
#align N₂Γ₂_compatible_with_N₁Γ₀ N₂Γ₂_compatible_with_N₁Γ₀
N₁Γ₀_inv_app_f_f:
@[simp]
theorem N₁Γ₀_inv_app_f_f (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) (n : ℕ) :
    (N₁Γ₀.inv.app K).f.f n = (Γ₀.splitting K).to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁.hom.f.f n :=
  by
  rw [N₁Γ₀_inv_app]
  apply id_comp
#align N₁Γ₀_inv_app_f_f N₁Γ₀_inv_app_f_f
N₁Γ₀_inv_app:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem N₁Γ₀_inv_app (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) :
    N₁Γ₀.inv.app K =
      «expr ≫ » ((toKaroubi _).map (Γ₀NondegComplexIso K).inv) (Γ₀.splitting K).to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁.hom :=
  by
  change (N₁Γ₀.app K).inv = _
  simpa only [N₁Γ₀_app]
#align N₁Γ₀_inv_app N₁Γ₀_inv_app
N₁Γ₀_hom_app_f_f:
@[simp]
theorem N₁Γ₀_hom_app_f_f (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) (n : ℕ) :
    (N₁Γ₀.hom.app K).f.f n = (Γ₀.splitting K).to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁.inv.f.f n :=
  by
  rw [N₁Γ₀_hom_app]
  apply comp_id
#align N₁Γ₀_hom_app_f_f N₁Γ₀_hom_app_f_f
N₁Γ₀_hom_app:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem N₁Γ₀_hom_app (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) :
    N₁Γ₀.hom.app K =
      «expr ≫ » (Γ₀.splitting K).to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁.inv ((toKaroubi _).map (Γ₀NondegComplexIso K).hom) :=
  by
  change (N₁Γ₀.app K).hom = _
  simpa only [N₁Γ₀_app]
#align N₁Γ₀_hom_app N₁Γ₀_hom_app
N₁Γ₀_app:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≪≫ » -/
/-

Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Joël Riou
-/
theorem N₁Γ₀_app (K : ChainComplex C ℕ) :
    N₁Γ₀.app K =
      «expr ≪≫ » (Γ₀.splitting K).to_karoubi_nondeg_complex_iso_N₁.symm
        ((toKaroubi _).map_iso (Γ₀NondegComplexIso K)) :=
  by
  ext1
  dsimp [N₁Γ₀]
  erw [id_comp, comp_id, comp_id]
  rfl
#align N₁Γ₀_app N₁Γ₀_app
